Downloaded images will be deleted too. Default exercises of OpenTraining won"'"t be deleted.
Currently only new exercises can be downloaded. In future you may be able to sync your workouts with wger. SSL encryption will always be used to protect your privacy.
Can"'"t start sync: no internet connection
Downloading images (this may take some minutes)
Notification when you should continue your training
